mapper.update:
UPDATE OM_GROUP
guid = #{guid,jdbcType=varchar},
group_code = #{group_code,jdbcType=varchar},
group_name = #{group_name,jdbcType=varchar},
group_type = #{group_type,jdbcType=varchar},
group_status = #{group_status,jdbcType=varchar},
group_desc = #{group_desc,jdbcType=varchar},
guid_org = #{guid_org,jdbcType=varchar},
guid_parents = #{guid_parents,jdbcType=varchar},
isleaf = #{isleaf,jdbcType=char},
sub_count = #{sub_count,jdbcType=decimal},
group_level = #{group_level,jdbcType=decimal},
group_seq = #{group_seq,jdbcType=varchar},
start_date = #{start_date,jdbcType=date},
end_date = #{end_date,jdbcType=date},
guid_emp_manager = #{guid_emp_manager,jdbcType=varchar},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=timestamp},
lastupdate = #{lastupdate,jdbcType=date},
updator = #{updator,jdbcType=varchar}
WHERE guid = #{guid}
